title: Goldstone-type superfields and partial spontaneous breaking of D=3, N=2 supersymmetry
abstract: We consider the modified superfield constraints with constant terms for the D=3, N=2 Goldstone-Maxwell gauge multiplet which contains Goldstone fermions, real scalar and vector fields. The partial spontaneous breaking N=2 to N=1 is possible for the non-minimal self-interaction of this modified gauge superfield including the linear Fayet-Iliopoulos term. The dual description of the partial breaking in the model of the self-interacting Goldstone chiral superfield is also discussed.
